GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.37 to before v5.4.165
GSD.description:
can: pch_can: pch_can_rx_normal: fix use after free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.165 by commit abb4eff3dcd2e583060082a18a8dbf31f02689d4, it was introduced in version v2.6.37 by commit b21d18b51b31a24d17f883b678432fbdee3d5675. For more details please see the references link.
